hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ubadah bin Samit said:“I asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) the about the Saying of Allah, Glorious is He: ‘For them are glad tidings, in the life of the present world, and in the Hereafter.”[10:64] He said: ‘Those are good dreams that a Muslim sees or are seen about him.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّؤْيَا الصَّالِحَةِ يَرَاهَا الْمُسْلِمُ أَوْ تُرَى لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: A Good Dream That Is Seen By The Muslim, Or Is Seen About Him
